thread.title: RUMOURS: Man Utd plotting Perisic approach
thread.title_full: RUMOURS: Man Utd plotting Perisic approach

title: RUMOURS: Man Utd plotting Perisic approach
text:
0 9 Jan 2017 15:39:15 Arsenal, Chelsea and Liverpool were all linked with the Inter winger last summer, but the Red Devils have now joined the hunt for his signature 
Manchester United are considering a January approach for Inter winger Ivan Perisic, according to Calciomercato . 
Arsenal, Chelsea and Liverpool were all linked with the Croatia international last summer, but he saw out the window still on the books at the San Siro. 
He has gone on to score six goals for Inter so far this season, with that return enough to keep him in the thoughts of Europeâ€™s top clubs. 
United are the latest side from the Premier League to express an interest, with Jose Mourinho open to the idea of bringing added versatility and creativity into his squad.
